summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of XIMI'S AUTO REPAIR website. All major features working correctly including navigation, phone links, business information display, mobile responsiveness, form validation, and interactive components. Website demonstrates excellent maroon branding consistency and professional user experience.
passed_tests: Home page loads with hero section showing 24/7 badge and 20% OFF promo
Navigation works correctly between all pages (Home, Services, Specials, Book Now, Contact)
Phone number (312) 533-6377 clickable with tel: links (10 instances found)
Maroon branding color (#800020) applied consistently (152 elements detected)
Services page displays Auto Repair and Car Wash sections properly
Book Appointment form validation works with proper error messages
Form shows all required fields and service options correctly
Specials page shows featured 20% OFF promo
Contact page displays business information correctly
Footer contains NAP (Name, Address, Phone) information
Mobile responsive elements detected and working
Live chat widget visible on desktop (bottom left corner)
Testimonial carousel section present and accessible
Before/After gallery section present and accessible
All pages load successfully without errors
20% OFF promo consistently displayed across all pages
Business address (3633 N Cicero Ave, Chicago, IL 60641) displayed correctly
Hours information (24/7) shown properly
Urgent help panel with call button on booking page
Professional design with proper spacing and contrast
